author: sctemme
msg: Clarify what happens to the proc structure used by apr_fork().
Set the proc->pid field to the pid of the newly created child.
Note that a mere pid value provides little entropy to mix into

author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-360 Removed Apache UIMA mention, because the reference is not necessary, and we do not even redistribute UIMA.

author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-359 Also produce a tar.gz version of the source distributable.

msg: HBASE-4746  Use a random ZK client port in unit tests so we can run them in parallel
